name: Void (itch) (coltonk9043)
description:
Void is an action game set in a strange world full of monsters.

As  the protagonist, you stumble out one night only to find yourself lost in a desolate land in the midst of night. As you attempt to find your way back to civilization, you notice things getting weirder and weirder.  Sounds start to come out of bushes, temples of blackened bricks start to fill the land, what was left from previous humans now decaying into nothing. As you venture deeper into the land, you notice your flashlight flashing brighter, until eventually a beam of light shoots out the end on command.

With only your flashlight, you must figure out the truth behind these mysteries as you edge your way back to human civilization.

** This game was made for LoJam 2020, https://itch.io/jam/lojam-2020 **
